3.label: Leakage Alarm
3.description: Sends notification in Case of Leakage

paramInformation.label: Operation Mode
paramInformation.description: 0 valve always off; 1 user absent/holiday; 2 user present; 3 valve always on

paramInformation.label: Fixed Schedule Day
paramInformation.description: fixed day in bin 1111111, Su=1, Sa=2, Fr=4, Th=8, We=16, Tu=32, Mo=64, 0= auto

paramInformation.label: Automatic Schedule Time Interval
paramInformation.description: automatic schedule time interval between microlekage tests, if not fixed

paramInformation.label: Micro Leakage Pressure Drop
paramInformation.description: pressure drop in kPa

paramInformation.label: Micro Leakage Pressure Drop Abort
paramInformation.description: pressure drop in kPa

paramInformation.label: Number of Measurements
paramInformation.description: how many in one time period

paramInformation.label: Reaction to Micro Leakage
paramInformation.description: 0=disable detection, 1=blink LED, 2=blink LED and shut off valve

options.label: Blink LED and Shut Off Valve

paramInformation.label: Macro Leakage Detected
paramInformation.description: 0 = no leackage  1 = leakage

paramInformation.label: Max Liters (Present Mode)
paramInformation.description: max liters single water abstraction if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: Max Continous Liters (Present Mode)
paramInformation.description: max liter continuous water abstraction if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: Max Time (Present Mode)
paramInformation.description: max time of single water abstraction if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: Max Continous Time (Present Mode)
paramInformation.description: max time of continous water abstraction if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: Macro Leakage Deactivation Time
paramInformation.description: temporary macro leakage deactivation (e.g. filling pool)

paramInformation.label: Reaction to Macro Leakage
paramInformation.description: 0=disable detection, 1=blink LED, 2= blink LED and shut off valve

options.label: Blink LED and Shut Off Valve

paramInformation.label: Flooding Sensor Leak Detected
paramInformation.description: 0-no leakage, 1- flooding sensor detected leakage

paramInformation.label: Reaction to Flooding Sensor
paramInformation.description: 0=disable detection, 1=blink LED, 2= blink LED and shut off valve

options.label: Blink LED and Shut Off Valve

paramInformation.label: Time Set Correctly
paramInformation.description: 1 = time is set correctly, 0 = time is not set correctly

paramInformation.label: Total Operating Time
paramInformation.description: Counting total operation time internally

paramInformation.label: Operating Time Since Last Power On
Auto Absent
paramInformation.description: 0 = disable, 1-168h time after no use, operation mode is changed to 1 (absent)

paramInformation.label: Water Temperature High Threshold
paramInformation.description: water temperature high threshold for warning of sanitary problems

paramInformation.label: Water Temperature Low Threshold
paramInformation.description: warning of risk of frost

paramInformation.label: Water Pressure High Threshold
paramInformation.description: warning of values above valid operating cond.

paramInformation.label: Water Pressure Low Threshold
paramInformation.description: water pressure low threshold for warning of values below valid operating cond.

paramInformation.label: Error Code
paramInformation.description: error code to identify the reason of a warning or fault

paramInformation.label: Autolearning
paramInformation.description: automatic adaption of limits, set ids 15-26 to learned values

metadata.inclusion:
a) Set the Z-Wave network main controller into adding mode.
b) Press and hold the 3th button (marked as Zwave/Wifi) on the main unit for 3 seconds. If Secure inclusion is required insert the passcode at the conntroller (found at the side of the main unit). The button will turn white on successfull inclusion.
metadata.exclusion:
a) Set the Z-Wave network main controller into removing mode.
b) Press the 3th button (marked as Zwave/Wifi) on the main unit 3 times within 3 seconds. THe button will flash yellow for 30 seconds. When exclusion is completed the button will go off.
metadata.reset: Press first and last button on main unit for 20 seconds. The 3th button (marked as Zwave/Wifi) will flash red. Pless the 3th button within 6 seconds to factory reset the main unit.
